content: christmas star this delicate star is crocheted with a strand of thread weight cotton and a strand of metallic thread add a dash of dazzle to your holidays with this beautiful ornament hook chain 4 slip_stitch in the first chain to form a ring round 1 chain 4 counts as first double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet chain 1 in ring 7 times slip_stitch in 3rd chain of beg chain 4 slip_stitch in next chain 1 space 8 stitches total round 2 chain 3 double_crochet in same chain 1 space * chain 2 2 double_crochet chain 2 in next chain 1 space * repeat from 6 times slip_stitch in top of beg chain 3 slip_stitch in next double_crochet and in next chain 2 space round 3 chain 3 2 double_crochet in same chain 2 space * chain 3 3 double_crochet ch3 in next chain 2 space * repeat from 6 times slip_stitch in top of beg materials needed chain 3 slip_stitch in next 2 double_crochet and in next chain 3 space 100% cotton crochet thread size 10 round 4 chain 3 double_crochet picot 2 double_crochet in the first metallic blending filament or metallic * chain 3 space chain 2 skip nearest double_crochet and sl embroidery thread st in the next double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet picot 2 double_crochet in size d crochet hook or size needed to * the next chain 3 space repeat from 6 achieve the desired look… times chain 2 skip nearest double_crochet and slip_stitch in the next double_crochet chain 2 slip_stitch in top of beg chain 3 tapestry needle fasten_off gauge not critical for this project using the needle weave in all ends cut a 6 length of the metallic filament thread it into the needle pull the filament/thread special techniques through one of the points of the star tie the two ends together in an overhand knot picot chain 4 slip_stitch into the first chain to to create a hanging loop hang the star on complete the picot a branch on your christmas tree happy holidays instructions work with the cotton thread and the metallic filament held together as if they are one strand make a slip knot and place it on the ©jennifer k stark october 2013 jenniferkstark@msn com guppylovesshark wordpress com
